title: [RO++] Evaluation of policy options to deal with the greenhouse effect
abstract: Invitation to tender for a study contract concerning the development of a framework for the evaluation of policy options to deal with the greenhouse effect as well as access strategies in this field.
text:
Invitation to tender for a study contract concerning the development of a framework for the evaluation of policy options to deal with the greenhouse effect as well as access strategies in this field.Further information from:
Dr. B. Delogu
Commission of the European Communities, DG XI/4 (Guim 3/31)
200 rue de la Loi
B-1049 Brussels
